"Suffren": "I have something of a history with Rysas. We go way back, and he's always weighed on my mind."
"...Rysas went missing a few years ago, you see."
"We made a search party, not unlike the one that was made for Ilma."
"However, no matter how many days we searched, we weren't able to find Rysus."
"Some folks searching even ended up getting injured..."
"It was going to be dangerous to continue any longer, so the search for Rysas was called off."
"...Without finding even a trace of what could have happened to him."
"But, if he was able to leave that message in Lost Central, he could have left other clues as well."
"Sorry to ask this of you, but could you give the place another search if you get the chance?"
"If you find anything you think might be important, please let me know."
